xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
# Translations for the LiveTable found on QA.WebHome qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.doc.name=Test Name qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.doc.space=Test Space qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.platform=Latest product version tested qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.browsers=Tested Browsers qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.databases=Tested Databases qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.automated=Automated Tests qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable._actions=Action qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.no.tests.execution.found=No test executions found qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable._actions.runTest=Run Test
# Translations for the buttons from QA.WebHome qaapp.WebHome.addTest.button=Add Test qaapp.WebHome.statistics.button=Statistics qaapp.WebHome.management.button=Management
# Translations for Management Page qaapp.Management.AddTest.button=Add new Test qaapp.Management.AddPlatform.button=Add new Platform qaapp.Management.AddBrowser.button=Add new Browser qaapp.Management.AddDatabase.button=Add new Database
# Translations for the Add Test form qaapp.AddTest.button=Add a new test qaapp.AddTest.testName.label=Test Name qaapp.AddTest.testSpace.label=Test Space
# Translations in the Add Platform form qaapp.AddPlatform.button=Add a new platform qaapp.AddPlatform.platformName.label=Platform Name qaapp.AddPlatform.platformVersion.label=Platform Version
# Translations in the Add Browser form qaapp.AddBrowser.button=Add a new browser qaapp.AddBrowser.browserName.label=Browser Name qaapp.AddBrowser.browserVersion.label=Browser Version
# Translations in the Add Database form qaapp.AddDatabase.button=Add a new database qaapp.AddDatabase.databaseName.label=Database Name qaapp.AddDatabase.databaseVersion.label=Database Version
